levels.description: When detonated, all enemies in range take <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> Wulfenite's ATK as Physical damage <@ba.vup>twice</>, and have <@ba.vup>-{-def:0%}</> DEF (does not stack) for <@ba.vup>{duration}</>s
